name: Oil Train Racing Simulator 3D
description:
Welcome to the Oil Train Racing Simulator 3D game and show your driving skills and become the real driver of this Train Sim 2018. The main purpose of this train is transporting fuel refined oil and high flammable gasoline safely to railway gas station. Drive the most Big Transporter Truck drive across the world from the world and show us your driving skills in a real traffic conditions and full of fun missions with Endless fun and excitement. No doubt this is one of the best off-road road train driving oil tanker and you feel like a real road train driver 2018.

You will enjoy the off-road Oil Train Racing Simulator 3D game drive cargo transportation while driving heavy duty on snow as a oil tanker transporter. Indian train cargo delivery game 3D is for the lovers of transportation games or oil tanker cargo games and train driving games. Be the paramount road train driver to fulfill your transportation duty. Standout as the top driver or heavy duty vehicles to enjoy realistic 3D game play. Play as an professional oil tanker road train driver who has the potential of tanker driving on deceitful tracks or off road areas.

Your duty as a cargo truck driver is to reach safely on destinations. It's a wonderful oil tanker road train in the Tanker driver game. You need to avoid the train crashes as oil is known as a black gold and very expensive. Focus more to control as track is very dangerous. Forget all the driving simulations and transporting games and download this oil tanker road train simulator.


features:
- Outstanding off-road environment with 3D effect.
- Thrilling level to enjoy the offroad.
- Driving Fun on Mountain with Real Traffic environment.
